p: Analytical pure reagents, ferric chloride hexahydrate, 2,4,6-tripyridyl-s-triazine (TPTZ), trichloroacetic acid, acetone, and anhydrous ethanol were purchased from Taixin Chemical (Chongqing, China). 2.2-Diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) and ascorbic acid were purchased from Yuanye Biotech (Shanghai China). 2‑Phenyl-4,4,5,5-tetramethyl-imidazoline-1-oxyl 3‑oxide (PTIO) was purchased from TCI Chemicals (Shanghai, China).
